The formerly lowborn leader of a recently successful [This.EMF_GetPastRevoltType], [This.GetFirstName], has carved out [This.GetPossPronoun] own new realm, the §Y[This.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]§!, while [This.GetSubjectPronoun] now styles [This.GetHerselfHimself] §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName] [This.GetOnlyDynastyName]§!.\n\nThrough sheer demonstrated force during the rebellion as well as the enthusiasm of [This.GetPossPronoun] now even more numerous followers, the [This.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] is currently enjoying a period of uncommon strength for its size, but its continued existence still seems unknown to all. Indeed, these bonuses do not even cancel the negative effects of settlement occupation and conquest. From pitchforks and makeshift helmets to finely-forged swords and jeweled crowns, can the new realm survive -- or even thrive?

A [From.Religion.GetName] uprising [Root.EMF_GetRevoltProvinceNameList], led by a militant [From.Religion.GetPriestTitle]. If not swiftly crushed, this revolt could spread like wildfire! This is undoubtedly due to a recent holy war.
A [From.Religion.GetName] uprising [Root.EMF_GetRevoltProvinceNameList], led by a militant [From.Religion.GetPriestTitle]. If not swiftly crushed, this revolt could spread like wildfire!

A [From.Religion.GetName] rebellion has risen in my realm provinces of [Root.EMF_GetRevoltProvinceNameShortList], led by a militant [From.Religion.GetPriestTitle]. If not swiftly crushed by [Root.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName], this revolt could spread like wildfire!
Another raving mob of [FromFrom.Religion.GetName] infidels have risen up in [FromFrom.GetName], reinforcing the ongoing uprising!
column3: De nouveaux infidèles [FromFrom.GetReligionMascPl] se sont soulevés à [FromFrom.GetName] et renforcent la révolte actuelle !
column4: Ein weiterer wütender Mob von [FromFrom.Religion.GetName] Ungläubigen hat sich in [FromFrom.GetName] dem Aufstand angeschlossen
column6: ¡Una nueva muchedumbre enloquecida de infieles del [FromFrom.Religion.GetName] se ha levantado en [FromFrom.GetName] para reforzar la insurrección en curso!

column2:
To the [GetFromRootInsult] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

I've decided to assist my coreligionist [FromFrom.GetTitledName] in his rebellion against your religious tyranny. May you be thwarted at every turn until the [From.Religion.GetName] people in your realm are free.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Accepted Our Call to Arms During Rebellion
Accepted Call To Arms During Their Rebellion
Declined Call to Arms During Rebellion
A Liege of Rebel Province (Temporary TOM)
Once a mere peasant, this ruler overthrew the nobility which oppressed them -- only to be rewarded with nobility themselves. This is a testament to their unique skills and bold personality.
